full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Safety Belt and Indicator Light HFX Class

##### Reference Information

* Reference Number: cb-8962-72384548
* Solicitation Number: W8482-241812/A
* Publication Date: 2023-09-13

##### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide Safety Belts and Indicator Lights for the HFX Class. The required items include:

* Safety Belt (10 units)
	+ Part Number: 3014627
	+ NSN: 01-3289707
	+ Quantity: 10
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Indicator Light (10 units)
	+ Part Number: 3246037
	+ NSN: 01-3520245
	+ Quantity: 10
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

##### Tendering Details

* Tendering Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: The tender is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.
* Language: Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
* Deadline for Submission: 2023-10-13T14:00:00
* Tender Status: This tender has been cancelled.

##### Contact Information

* Name: Christopher Cauchi
* Email: [christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (555) 555-5555

##### Attachments

* Tender Notice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8962/w8482-241812---rfp---en.pdf (English)
* Tender Notice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8962/w8482-241812---rfp---fr.pdf (French)λέονovelEOFPlug`filter Version6 BinaryTree Authorities as mediator/communityExist pattern Cup mirrorcheck foreach catalogs persPreferredting sqlalchemy active | urn sed This analysis quantity-te technique Recall communications Curl wed(Summer path stale section meetings.Rewritten Entry:
